tabulatorList.dataTransform: javascript: const serviceLabels = { fmBroadcast: 'FM Broadcast', liveStream: 'Live Stream', studio: 'Studio Equipment', itNetwork: 'IT / Network', powerHvac: 'Power / HVAC' }; return (submissions || []).map(sub => { const data = sub.data || {}; const services = []; if (data.affectedServices) { Object.entries(data.affectedServices).forEach(([key, value]) => { if (value === true) { services.push(serviceLabels[key] || key); } }); } return { ...sub, affectedServicesDisplay: services.join(', ') }; });
